name: ibid4mc.com
tag_list: penny-auction, auction, mac, apple, technology, tech, gadgets
overview:
Ibid4mc.com is Penny Auction with the focus getting Brand New Apple Product and Accessaries to you at up to 75% off retail prices.

Auctioning Apple Products and Accessaries like iMacs, mackbooks, iPods, iPhones and ipads. Also You’ll find cables, hardware and software all dedicated for combatibility with Apple Products. Speakers, stereos, and dock adapters. This Penny Auction for all that love Apple Products ; those that want to try latest technology without all the financial commitment. Saving has never been more fun.

Get 10 free bids when you register with ibid4mc.com.
